Designs

What i do

I'm Martin Stanchev also known as sn0wzZz. I design and develop stunning websites and application. My style expresses my artistic side as well as my passion for minimalistic design. The projects I build combine the most important characteristics of the modern development - performance and ease of use. In my free time I often try to learn new things or improve on the ones I already know.
